actions.name: DeleteReportDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Cost and Usage Report Definition

actions.name: DescribeReportDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to get Cost and Usage Report Definitions

actions.name: GetClassicReport
actions.description: Grants permission to get Bills CSV report

actions.name: GetClassicReportPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to get the classic report enablement status for Usage Reports

actions.name: GetUsageReport
actions.description: Grants permission to get list of AWS services, usage type and operation for the Usage Report workflow. Allows or denies download of usage reports too

actions.name: ModifyReportDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to modify Cost and Usage Report Definition

actions.name: PutClassicReportPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to enable classic reports

actions.name: PutReportDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to write Cost and Usage Report Definition

actions.name: ValidateReportDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to validates if the s3 bucket exists with appropriate permissions for CUR delivery
